entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Hopefully no one was watching when you lost that fight.
entries.journal_entry_description: You failed to defeat Ames but don't worry, you might get a second chance.
entries.journal_entry_title: You failed to teach Ames a lesson.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You failed to defeat Ames in melee combat.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Tell the Meatlump Supply Clerk what happened.
